name: auto-transfer-solana
description: This JavaScript script utilizes the Solana Web3.js library to automate the periodic transfer of Solana (SOL) cryptocurrency from one wallet (using its PRIVATE_KEY) to another (RECIPIENT_ADDRESS).  The script continuously monitors the balance of a source wallet (using its PRIVATE_KEY) and initiates transfers to a specified RECIPIENT_ADDRESS when sufficient funds are available or transferred to the Host wallet (using its PRIVATE_KEY).
